english.segment1: Over the mountain, take me across the sky. Something in my vision, something deep inside. Where did I wander, where d'ya think I wandered to. I've seen life's magic astral plane I travel through
english.segment2: I heard them tell me that this land of dreams was now. I told them I had ridden shooting stars. And said I'd show them how
english.segment3: Over and over, always tried to get away. Living in a daydream, only place I had to stay. Fever of a breakout burning in me miles wide. People around me talking to the walls inside
english.segment4: I heard them tell me that this land of dreams was now. I told them I had ridden shooting stars. And said I'd show them how
english.segment5: Don't need no astrology, it's inside of you and me. You don't need a ticket to fly with me, I'm free, yeah
english.segment6: Over and under, in between the ups and downs. Mind on a carpet, magic ride goes 'round and round. Over the mountain, kissing silver inlaid clouds. Watching my body disappear into the crowd
english.segment7: Don't need no astrology, it's inside of you and me. You don't need a ticket to fly with me, I'm free, yeah
